# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/global.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/global.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/global.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/global.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/global.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/global2.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/global2.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/global3.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/global3.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/global_hspice.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/global_hspice.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/global_hspice.cir.tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/global_hspice.cir.tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global.cir.sh COMMAND bash global.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} global.cir ${OutputDataDir}/GLOBALNODE/global.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;globalnode;issue445;valgrind")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global2.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> global2.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global2.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;globalnode;issue445;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global2.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP global2.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global2.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} global2.cir ${OutputDataDir}/GLOBALNODE/global2.cir.prn global2.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global2.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED global2.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global3.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> global3.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global3.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;globalnode;issue445;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global3.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP global3.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global3.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} global3.cir ${OutputDataDir}/GLOBALNODE/global3.cir.prn global3.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}GLOBALNODE/global3.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED global3.cir)
endif()
